set_value.name: $factionPriorityText
set_value.exact: if $factionPriority == 0 then 'Player Only' else if $factionPriority == 1 then 'Foreign First' else 'Equal Priority'

debug_text.text:
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === TRADE SEARCH START ===' + '
Ship: ' + $ship.knownname + '
Pilot: ' + $pilotInfo + '
Current Sector: ' + $ship.sector.knownname + '
Max Distance: ' + $maxDistance + ' jumps' + '
Min ROI: ' + $minROI + '%' + '
Min Absolute Profit: ' + ($minAbsoluteProfit / 100) + ' Cr' + '
Ship Cargo: ' + ($ship.cargo.capacity.all - $ship.cargo.free.all) + '/' + $ship.cargo.capacity.all
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') No suitable cached trade found, performing live market search'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ“Š BEST TRADE SELECTED:' + '
 ðŸ“¦ Ware: ' + $bestTrade.$BuyOffer.ware.name + ' (x' + $bestTrade.$Amount + ')' + '
 ðŸ“ BUY from: ' + $bestTrade.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($bestTrade.$BuyPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸ“ SELL to: ' + $bestTrade.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($bestTrade.$SellPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸš€ Distance: ' + $bestTrade.$Distance + ' jumps' + '
 ðŸ’° Profit: ' + ($bestTrade.$Profit / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸ“ˆ ROI: ' + @$bestTrade.$ROI + '%' + '
 ðŸ“Š Score: ' + $bestTrade.$Score + '
 âš Risk: ' + $bestTrade.$Risk

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === NO TRADES FOUND ANALYSIS ===' + '
Ship: ' + $ship.knownname + '
Sector: ' + $ship.sector.knownname + '
Search params: Dist=' + $maxDistance + ', MinROI=' + $minROI + '%, MinAbsoluteProfit=' + ($minAbsoluteProfit / 100) + ' Cr' + '

ðŸ“Š REJECTION STATISTICS:' + '
 â›” Docking not allowed: ' + $tradesRejectedDocking + '
 ðŸ’° Insufficient profit: ' + $tradesRejectedProfit + '
 ðŸ“ Distance too far: ' + $tradesRejectedDistance + '
 ðŸ“¦ Amount zero/negative: ' + $tradesRejectedAmount + '
 â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”' + '
 TOTAL REJECTED: ' + ($tradesRejectedDocking + $tradesRejectedProfit + $tradesRejectedDistance + $tradesRejectedAmount) + (if $bestRejectedTrade? then '

ðŸ† BEST REJECTED TRADE (still unprofitable):' + '
 Ware: ' + @$bestRejectedTrade.$ware.name + '
 Buy from: ' + @$bestRejectedTrade.$buyFrom.knownname + ' @ ' + $bestRejectedTrade.$buyPrice + ' Cr/unit' + '
 Sell to: ' + @$bestRejectedTrade.$sellTo.knownname + ' @ ' + $bestRejectedTrade.$sellPrice + ' Cr/unit' + '
 Best profit found: ' + $bestRejectedTrade.$profit + ' Cr (needed: ' + $minAbsoluteProfit + ' Cr)' + '
 Best ROI found: ' + $bestRejectedTrade.$roi + '% (needed: ' + $minROI + '%)' else '')
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Search lock released'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ” SEARCH COMPLETE (active: ' + global.$GT_SearchQueue.$ActiveSearches + '/' + global.$GT_SearchQueue.$MaxConcurrent + ', queued: ' + global.$GT_SearchQueue.$Ships.count + ')'

'[GT-Cache-DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Home sector resolution:' + '
 HomeBase: ' + @$homeBase.knownname + '
 HomeSector: ' + @$homeSector.knownname + '
 Ship current sector: ' + @$ship.sector.knownname
'[GT-Cache] âš Cache too small (' + global.$GT_TradeCache.count + ' entries) - forcing live search to replenish'
'[GT-Cache-DEBUG] Cache has ' + global.$GT_TradeCache.count + ' trade entries'

do_if.value: not $cacheEntry? or not $cacheEntry.$BuyOffer? or not $cacheEntry.$SellOffer? or not $cacheEntry.$Timestamp?

debug_text.text: '[GT-Cache] â›” FILTERED sector pair: ' + @$failedTrade.$BuySector.knownname + ' â†’ ' + @$failedTrade.$SellSector.knownname + ' (reason: ' + $failedTrade.$Reason + ')'

'[GT-Cache] âš PATH BLOCKED: Trade route unreachable (disconnected sectors)' + '
 Ship: ' + $ship.idcode + '
 Ware: ' + @$cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.ware.name + '
 Buy: ' + @$cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + ' (distance: ' + $buyDistance + ')' + '
 Sell: ' + @$cacheEntry.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + ' (distance: ' + $sellDistance + ')'

'[GT-Cache-DEBUG] Entry ' + $i + ' Two-stage distance check:' + '
 Ware: ' + @$cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.ware.name + '
 Buy: ' + @$cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + ' (sector: ' + @$cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.owner.sector.knownname + ')' + '
 Sell: ' + @$cacheEntry.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + ' (sector: ' + @$cacheEntry.$SellOffer.owner.sector.knownname + ')' + '
 STAGE 1 - Range check (from home ' + @$homeSector.knownname + '):' + '
 Buy: ' + $rangeCheckBuy + ' jumps, Sell: ' + $rangeCheckSell + ' jumps, Total: ' + $totalRangeDistance + ' jumps' + '
 STAGE 2 - Reachability check (from current ' + @$ship.sector.knownname + '):' + '
 Buy: ' + $buyDistance + ' jumps, Sell: ' + $sellDistance + ' jumps' + '
 Note: Vanilla will handle blacklist routing when trade is executed'

'[GT-Cache] â›” UNREACHABLE: Cached trade blocked (path disconnected or blacklisted)' + '
 Ship: ' + $ship.idcode + ' (currently in: ' + $ship.sector.knownname + ')' + '
 Ware: ' + @$cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.ware.name + '
 Buy: ' + @$cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + ' (sector: ' + @$cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.owner.sector.knownname + ')' + '
 Sell: ' + @$cacheEntry.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + ' (sector: ' + @$cacheEntry.$SellOffer.owner.sector.knownname + ')' + '
 Range check (from home): PASSED (within ' + $maxDistance + ' jumps)' + '
 Reachability check (from current sector): FAILED' + '
 - Buy distance: ' + $buyDistance + ' jumps (from ' + $ship.sector.knownname + ')' + '
 - Sell distance: ' + $sellDistance + ' jumps' + '
 â†’ Trade filtered: No safe route from current position through non-blacklisted sectors' + '
 â†’ Skipping for this ship, but KEEPING in cache for other ships in different locations'

'[GT-Cache] âš ï¸ STALE CACHE ENTRY: Routes changed after cache creation' + '
 Ware: ' + @$cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.ware.name + '
 Buy: ' + @$cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + '
 Sell: ' + @$cacheEntry.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + '
 Cached distance: ' + $cacheEntry.$Distance + ' jumps' + '
 Current distance: ' + $currentDistance + ' jumps' + '
 Change: +' + $distanceChange + ' jumps (+' + (($distanceChange * 100) / $cacheEntry.$Distance) + '%)' + '
 â†’ REMOVING STALE ENTRY: Route significantly changed due to blacklist update'

'[GT-Cache] âš ï¸ ALTERNATIVE ROUTE: Blacklist forcing detour' + '
 Ware: ' + @$cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.ware.name + '
 Buy: ' + @$cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + '
 Sell: ' + @$cacheEntry.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + '
 Original distance: ' + $cacheEntry.$Distance + ' jumps' + '
 Blacklist-aware distance: ' + $currentDistance + ' jumps' + '
 Detour: +' + $distanceChange + ' jumps (avoiding blacklisted sectors)'
'[GT-Cache] â›” Skipping cached trade for ' + $cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.ware.name + ' (illegal ware, AllowIllegal=' + $allowIllegal + ') - continuing to next entry'
'[GT-Cache] â›” Skipping cached trade for ' + $cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.ware.name + ' (not in ware basket) - continuing to next entry'
'[GT-Cache] â›” Trade exceeds max distance (' + $currentDistance + ' > ' + $maxDistance + ')'
'[GT-Cache-DEBUG] Entry ' + $i + ': Ware=' + @$cacheEntry.$WareName + ', CachedEff=' + $efficiency + ', BestScore=' + $bestScore + ', WillQuery=' + $willQuery
'[GT-Cache] âš Cached stations no longer valid: Buy=' + $buyExists + ', Sell=' + $sellExists

'[GT-Cache] âœ… FRESH offers validated for cached trade: ' + $ware.name + ' (CachedROI=' + $cachedROI + '%, FreshROI=' + $freshROI + '%, Drop=' + $roiDrop + '%, Tolerance=' + $dropoffTolerance + '%, Profit=' + ($freshProfit/100) + ' Cr)'

'[GT-Cache] âš Fresh trade rejected: ' + $ware.name + ' (CachedROI=' + $cachedROI + '%, FreshROI=' + $freshROI + '%, Drop=' + $roiDrop + '%, Tolerance=' + $dropoffTolerance + '%, Threshold=' + $cacheThreshold + '%, Profit=' + ($freshProfit/100) + ' Cr)'
'[GT-Cache] âš Fresh trade not profitable: ' + $ware.name + ' (Profit=' + ($freshProfit/100) + ' Cr)'
'[GT-Cache] âš Fresh offers not available for cached trade: ' + $ware.name
'[GT-Cache] âœ… Cache HIT for ' + $ship.idcode + ': Found cached trade (Score: ' + $bestScore + ', checked: ' + $checkedEntries + ', valid: ' + $validEntries + ', expired: ' + $expiredEntries + ')'
'[GT-Cache] âŒ Cache MISS for ' + $ship.idcode + ': No valid cached trades (checked: ' + $checkedEntries + ', expired: ' + $expiredEntries + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ Home base: ' + @$homeBase.knownname + ' (sector: ' + $homeSector.knownname + ') [source: ' + $homeBaseSource + ']'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš¡ NATIVE ACTIONS: Collected ' + $allSellOffers.count + ' sell + ' + $allBuyOffers.count + ' buy offers (instant C++ query)'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ›¡ï¸ PRE-FILTERED blacklist: ' + $sellOffersBlacklisted + ' sell, ' + $buyOffersBlacklisted + ' buy (from reachable offers)'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Safe + reachable offers remaining: ' + $allSellOffers.count + ' sell, ' + $allBuyOffers.count + ' buy'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') â›” PRE-FILTERED illegal wares: ' + $sellOffersIllegal + ' sell, ' + $buyOffersIllegal + ' buy (AllowIllegal=' + $allowIllegal + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Legal offers remaining: ' + $allSellOffers.count + ' sell, ' + $allBuyOffers.count + ' buy'

do_if.value: ($allSellOffers.count gt 0 or $allBuyOffers.count gt 0) and $maxDistance? and $maxDistance gt 0

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ“ PRE-FILTERED distance (blacklist-aware): ' + $sellOffersDistanceFiltered + ' sell, ' + $buyOffersDistanceFiltered + ' buy (max: ' + $maxDistance + ' jumps)'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Reachable offers remaining: ' + $allSellOffers.count + ' sell, ' + $allBuyOffers.count + ' buy'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Total offers before indexing: ' + $allSellOffers.count + ' sell, ' + $allBuyOffers.count + ' buy'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš¡ OPTIMIZED: Limited to ' + $allSellOffers.count + ' sell + ' + $allBuyOffers.count + ' buy offers (top ' + $maxOffersPerWare + ' per ware)'
'[GT-Fleet] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Pre-cached ' + $reservedRoutes.count + ' reserved routes from ' + (global.$GT_ActiveTradeReservations.keys.count - 1) + ' other ships'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš¡ EARLY EXIT: Found ' + $tradeList.count + ' trades (threshold: ' + $earlyExitThreshold + '), stopping search'
'[GT-FLEET] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Selected non-conflicted trade (Score: ' + $nonConflictedBestScore + ')'
'[GT-FLEET] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš ï¸ Using best trade (Score: ' + $crossStationBestScore + ') - may conflict with active fleet routes'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ“‹ Collected ' + $tradeList.count + ' valid trades for AI validation'

'[GT-AI-List] ' + $ship.idcode + ' Trade #' + $idx + '/' + $tradeList.count + ':' + '
 Ware: ' + @$trade.$BuyOffer.ware.name + ' (x' + $trade.$Amount + ')' + '
 BUY: ' + @$trade.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($trade.$BuyPrice/100) + ' Cr' + '
 SELL: ' + @$trade.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($trade.$SellPrice/100) + ' Cr' + '
 Profit: ' + ($trade.$Profit/100) + ' Cr | ROI: ' + $trade.$ROI + '% | Score: ' + $trade.$Score + ' | Distance: ' + $trade.$Distance + ' jumps'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and $bestTrade and $bestTrade.$BuyStation? and $bestTrade.$SellStation?

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') SELECTED TRADE DOCKING: Ship=' + $ship.class + ' | BUY=' + @$bestTrade.$BuyStation.knownname + ' [' + $buyDockStatus + '] | SELL=' + @$bestTrade.$SellStation.knownname + ' [' + $sellDockStatus + ']'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') DOCKING RESTRICTIONS: Rejected ' + $tradesRejectedDocking + ' trade pairs due to incompatible docking (ship class: ' + $ship.class + ')'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === SELL SEARCH START ===' + '
Ship: ' + $ship.knownname + '
Current Sector: ' + $ship.sector.knownname + '
Max Distance: ' + $maxDistance + ' jumps' + '
Min Profit: ' + $minProfit + ' Cr'

'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Cargo contains ' + $currentCargo.count + ' ware types, selling first: ' + @$selectedWare.name + ' x' + $selectedAmount + ' (after sale, will retry for remaining wares)'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Rejected ' + @$station.knownname + ' (station blacklisted)'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Rejected ' + @$station.knownname + ' (sector activity blacklisted)'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Rejected ' + @$station.knownname + ' (sector travel blacklisted)'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Rejected ' + @$station.knownname + ' (path goes through blacklisted sector)'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Rejected ' + @$station.knownname + ' (not operational)'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Rejected ' + @$station.knownname + ' (docking not allowed)'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Best offer now: ' + @$station.knownname + ' - ' + $offer.ware.name + ' x' + $tradeAmount + ' @ ' + $offer.unitprice + ' Cr/unit (profit: ' + $profit + ' Cr)'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ' + $ship.knownname + ' found sell opportunity'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Best offer became invalid before order creation - retrying'
